description: This file defines a Discord client class that integrates with a bot framework, handling message events, media processing, and communication with agent or team components for generating responses.

classes.name: DiscordClient
classes.description: A class that manages a Discord bot client, handling message events, media processing, and delegating responses to an agent or team component.

methods.name: __init__
methods.description: Initializes the DiscordClient with optional agent or team, sets up intents and event handlers.

methods.name: _setup_events
methods.description: Defines the event handler for incoming messages, processing media and delegating responses.

methods.name: _send_discord_messages
methods.description: Sends messages to a Discord thread, splitting into batches if message length exceeds limit, with optional italics formatting.

methods.name: serve
methods.description: Starts the Discord client using a token from environment variables.
